name: Calculating the Dead
description:
Survive the zombie apocalypse by solving math problems! Train your addition, subtraction, and multiplication skills as you fight off hordes of undead. With fast-paced gameplay and keyboard controls, it's a thrilling battle for survival. How long can you last?

This project was made over a weekend as a way of testing the features of the text-to-image model Midjourney. Hope you like it!
